header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: New apartments, things to buy, things to do, connecting the internet, food, rubbish collection, cooking, seasonal produce, smoking cigarettes, the nursery next door, banking
header.activity: First day in the new apartment
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, requesting, anecdote telling, making arrangements

body.u: so welcome to the new apartment
mm not bad kitchen's definitely bigger than my mum led me to believe
yeah it is bigger isn't it
yeah
it's brighter
yeah
windows are nice
yeah nice big windows we do need something see something definitely went up there
yeah it did we have the hooks for it but we don't have the blinds or anything we definitely wanted it here though it's the other room
we should see how cheaply we can get those just those bamboo style like that was in here before
there's no like though is there though
no but there's like Poundland
no it just lives there
yeah you're right about that being a leaf
yeah it hasn't moved has it it wasn't a frog after all
so what else do we need to do this morning?
we do need some sort of a list I think to decide what it is exactly we need to buy so
we need a few more light bulbs
do we have any pen and paper? because we haven't got
I don't think we do have any
I've got a pen I've got a pen
I can write it on the computer oh if you've got a pen we'll find paper
that's not going to be useful if we're not going to take it out with us is it yeah I'm sure I've got a bank statement or something
yeah something we can write on
I've got one pen
what about an envelope?
did you bring back a bunch of pens from Korea or not?
erm no I don't think I did in the end I was right on my level how much weight I could take
oh yeah so you had to
I couldn't really take anymore
yeah what about that envelope? that seems like a good thing to make a list on
yeah right not having stuff is difficult
do you want some water? yeah
oh no this is the Virgin Media envelope
that's alright isn't it?
it's keeping everything together yeah would you pour me a glass
mm
there's got to be a piece of paper right
it's a really powerful tap
yeah it is really powerful
there you go
do you want to hold this a sec?
are you using the envelope?
what do you think?
yeah it's fine
erm
we don't actually need that you can put that stuff elsewhere can't you?
but it's all going to fall apart if I don't have anything to leave it in
is it important information in there?
I guess some of it is it's got like my account number and account details
do you have a folder you can put it in with your other like your degree certificate and that kind of thing?
yeah I do have a folder it's next door
so
terms of conditions
did they actually confirm the date of the installation on this letter?
why is there a freepost? what's this?
can I read the letter?
erm date of installation twenty-ninth of August one PM to six PM
such a broad time
I know broadband broad time
I think they routinely don't show up as well
yeah I guess maybe I should contact them and say are you definitely coming today? cos I'm waiting
number one please check and make a note of your installation date and time number two sign your contract and pop it back to us in in the envelope provided
which contract? where's that?
is that was this is? your signature
oh god I just signed those
number three register for my Virgin Media
surely I don't sign this until they come?

well it says your contract is ready and waiting for you in this welcome pack give it the once over to make sure everything's in order when you're happy sign the customer copy date it and pop it back to us so I don't know if like you need to do that before
when did they send out this letter?
that's what you grabbed yesterday off the guy wasn't it?
yeah yeah but when did they supposedly send it out?
twenty-third of August it's dated which is rubbish cos yesterday was the twenty-seventh
so you are you meant to? you're not meant to have got this back to them I don't think
what before you know?
surely it's got to get to you and then you send it to them they dated it the twenty-third it might not get to me till the twenty-fifth
yeah

as it was it was the twenty-sixth you have seven working days starting from the day after this contract has entered into to cancel it so you can cancel it within seven days I'm tempted to just leave this now until they install it it just says my contract ah contract date is from Friday the twenty-ninth I mean I'll ask the guy when he comes round what do I do with this then? do I just give it to you or do I?
yeah
do you know what I mean?
I think you'll find that he's just like the tech guy and you have to send that in
I mean I agree but I don't think it's a problem
I assume they will give us the internet connection I mean should we have signed something? they have our bank details in there
yeah I mean I've already given them the bank details
we don't need to they're still gonna act he's not just going to install something and then not activate it until they receive our contract are they?

oh god I hope not erm if attention if you're a new customer your first bill will show a different charge than that shown on this contract what? if you do not pay by direct am I set up for direct debit?
the best way to install broadband so the guy's meant to phone you before he arrives on Friday
is he? do they have my telephone number?
well I assume so did you give Virgin your telephone number?
I guess so I'm sure I would have done
or did you give them to somebody else?
I kind of need the internet to be able to check this stuff
I know it's kind of ironic isn't it we're so used to just going online and looking up the answers to questions
yeah is there a telephone number that I can ring for them anywhere?
I imagine there is customer service see it makes you think how much is that going to cost though? free oh
Skype if you have the internet yeah
maybe it depends on the number though doesn't it no
I can't find it
there must be a telephone number on this package somewhere
yeah I'm sure there is
people are going to want to call them up and ask questions
okay do I just leave that for now then?
yeah I guess so
I might just try and sort it out tomorrow
yeah
so am I am I signing this and posting it back today?
yeah I mean has it got an envelope?
yeah
that you don't have to pay
that means it's franked doesn't it?
I'm not sure I think so yeah otherwise it has a little sticker doesn't it saying affix stamp here yeah
affix stamp here I'm pretty sure that's been franked it's in Dunstable Luton
oh is that where Dunstable is?
yeah it's near to it
is that where Dunstable is?
or at least that's the Luton area code
yeah Dunstable on the post
I mean I'm on the area code in no no no Downs are near me
yeah don't know where I thought that was
yeah I went erm I flew a kite there a few times
I've heard of Dunstable
they go kite flying on Dunstable Downs
oh there are downs there that's why it's famous
Dunstable Downs so am I signing this? do I need to read it correctly? I mean this should be done but perhaps not right at this second
yeah we started off by making a list didn't we
you haven't even eaten breakfast
mm brunch
brunch
have a banana
have a banana right so what is it we need? this isn't very nice this piece of paper though
is it not?
no it's more like a piece of plasticy
I'm trying to think of a place where I may well have a piece of paper stashed erm paper that should handy to have a bit of notepad around
well I've ordered some once that comes through
oh you've ordered paper? for the for the printer?
I've ordered paper a printer erm and what else did I order? the nook and the nook cover that's coming
oh
that was already paid for when I evaluated
it's not special A4 paper is it?
it's just A4 paper it's just there's five hundred sheets for like five pounds or something
what are you up to?
getting a bit of paper
do you reckon you've got one? this room's looking okay it's definitely big
yeah it's a big size room
the paint job's a bit crappy
that's like the whole house though
these bay windows are nice though it is nice to have a big bay window if only they were a little bit clean
I know they're not even remotely clean I wonder if do you think they'll clean them? probably not hey
I don't know
yeah paper
oh nice
whose is that?
it's mine
oh you must have done that do you remember doing that?
did I draw it? yeah
I vaguely remember you doing it yeah
yeah that was quite a while ago though wasn't it
that was I was in like er that was er
don't touch it near the top
that was erm where was that? that's when we were living in apartments
yeah so what things did we say we needed?
erm I mean we should
we need some more light bulbs and some backup light bulbs
okay we'll get some more light bulbs
anything else?
erm if we go past any second hand shops we should probably look in to see if they've got a curtain net and curtain wire cos that will be the cheapest place to buy it I would think
god I need something to write on
erm
so what was the first thing we said?
light bulbs
curtain nets
curtain nets
or wire or whatever
mm
bulbs anything else?
I mean there's probably loads of stuff we need
plenty of things I know but until my dad comes up with my other boxes of stuff
no is your dad bringing er like you said your mum also gave or I don't know maybe your dad did but like other domestic stuff like shampoos and things?
yeah my mum
is there any cleaning products or anything in there?
yeah I've got a whole box of like toiletries and cleaning products and there's some big towels in there as well
oh is there? oh that's good then
yeah some big white towels
I feel like we should be on the lookout for some sort of storage fold away folder
I mean I've got a three tier you know like the one we had in Korea? that metal one?
yeah yeah yeah

or maybe it's two racks or something I don't know but it's erm it's like metal poles that you need to put together I can't be certain that all the bits are there but that would definitely definitely work
I can't think of anything else I don't know how or what I don't know
yeah
don't know
agree right so curtain nets wire bulbs
cleaning products I was going to say but that's coming erm
hmm that's kind of it for now isn't it or we're in limbo
yeah
we certainly need to do the shopping
yeah what food are we going to? how are we going to approach dinner and?
I'm not entirely sure
I mean you could cook something tonight for two two nights worth couldn't you for yourself as well
yeah I guess so I need to cook something to
or is that very exciting like tomorrow night you just reheat your dinner?
I mean I guess it doesn't really matter I'm not going to go out it doesn't have to be exciting does it
no
I just need to eat I just don't know if I can be bothered to cook at the minute the place is in such a state
that's true well maybe we should keep it basic then just
basic wasn't very tasty though was it
no no more more than that we should get some vegetables definitely
good old bolognese is easy it takes a little while
it does take a little while
but once you get it on it's nice and easy
mm
and erm
doesn't that cost a lot of electricity now though?
er it does doesn't it fuck oh bugger
I don't really want to leave anything on for four hours
do you think profanity's okay on this thing?
yeah
cos I swear quite a bit
yeah yeah it's normal
yeah I think you could do a study into how much people swear around different people
you could just some like vegetables potatoes chicken
it's not something I can reheat tomorrow though is it
oh yeah sorry
I mean you could do a faster bolognese or a chilli chilli would reheat fine
you need to get some kidney beans
yeah dry kidney beans would be great
they had some at the
Indian shop
yeah
why didn't you get them?
I can't remember how much they were I don't know why I didn't get them
we need other beans made a spicy bean wrap he likes his beans
yeah
that had quite a few different ones in the Indian shop
so we need to get into beans we've got lentils we've got chick peas
could do like wraps
need to buy tortillas
yeah
what are we doing the wraps with?
chicken or beef
oh so we're not going with chilli?
tomatoes or chillies
you can just buy canned kidney beans
oh that's true we do have to we do need to buy rice as well though
yeah it's not a bad thing to have though is it rice
no it's not and maybe some veg and some fruit and then you can always do like a veg fried rice or something when you're waiting for you dad
so chilli
on Saturday
ingredients we need eggs we always need eggs
mm
erm fruit and veg
yeah some sort of fruit and veg how are we going to? oh no we'll just take
and we need rice we're going to have rice with the chilli
yeah
we need yoghurt don't we?
yeah for breakfast
for the morning yoghurt cheese to go with the chilli cheese is more reasonable
yeah
you get a big old block in Lidl's for like two pound
two pounds yeah
don't think the taste is that great but I mean they've got like extra mature
mm
it's not terrible so yoghurt cheese you have fruit and veg rice eggs chilli ingredients erm which is what? like kidney beans onions what else?
do you put? you don't put peppers in the chilli do you?
erm you can do but I don't normally no
do you put chillies in the chilli?
do I put peppers in the chilli? do you remember?
no you don't I don't think
do I do it but I just cut it up a lot smaller now I can't remember
it goes on fajitas I don't remember I thought you stopped putting it in chilli
yeah I did put a lot in there
cos you cos erm you were trying to make a pure chilli yeah
it tasted better without it
got cinnamon cinnamon
erm one red pepper might go in it alright but it might just not oh we've got all the herbs and spices we need I take it?
yeah I don't know I don't know about we don't have any herbs
okay erm but we have all the spices you think?
we've got chilli cumin
yeah paprika?
oh I don't know if I bought paprika
no paprika that's alright I can just use chilli powder
I could have done I don't know why I didn't
don't need much cinnamon onions kidney beans we need garlic obviously I mean onion garlic these are staples we need just general staples you know
yeah yeah

what else is special for a chilli kidney beans really are there any like cheap tacos? it's just adding a bit to it though it's like crème fraiche but only if there's yoghurt we'll just get some Greek yoghurt and a bit of lemon juice
lemon juice yeah lemon juice
but erm
squeezy lemon
do we have a whisk? I've got a proper turny whisk coming
oh have you? yeah that will make things easier
yeah I think so I'm pretty sure
that helps a little bit not electric though we haven't got that far
no it's going to get a bit it's a bit strange that we're only here for a year again that everything is a year a year a year a year we keep
yeah
changing every year
there's no sense of permanence for it
it makes you realise how quick a year is as well
yeah
there's enough time to get set up and get going and like to do something but
it's necessary to set up and get a sense so you have like you've got a routine as quick as possible
you are here for a year is there anything else we need? I guess as we think of things we can add it to the list
we can add it onto the list yeah
we need a dustpan and brush but we have a hoover at the minute and who knows what's coming up with my stuff
dad father yeah
yeah
erm
I hope my speakers work those speakers need a clean everything needs a clean
yeah most things need a clean
mm
do we need to contact the agency or go in there at all and ask them if any questions?
probably but maybe on Monday or something like that
yeah okay fine just about simple like rubbish day and I guess you could perhaps ask your neighbours
I mean there's no harm going in there with s or sending them an email with a bunch of photos or something
mm

or going in there and talking them and then sending them an email with a bunch of photos afterwards just say I've taken a few photos of some things that I might need looking at or just at least so you understand that come the end of the semester if I leave in similar condition then that's okay
yeah that's fine
erm
because yeah I'm not being charged to clean windows when when I moved in no-one was charged to clean them
no yeah and they hadn't been cleaned these windows are quite filthy actually those ones at the front
mm
erm
why don't they just get someone around to clean them?
yeah I don't know
well it's not a very good impression our landlord leaves
no I think it's fair to erm probably give the weekend what's the date today? Thursday? I guess I could go in tomorrow or the two of us could go in tomorrow
mm
a couple of days would have passed it might be good to know when the rubbish goes out but I don't think we're producing well we do have rubbish
yeah we have yeah we
we're going to build up with rubbish
it seemed like the stuff went out this morning which was like had we known
it might be more frequent
yeah
there's quite a few people that live down this road
mm
with some small bins by the looks of things
I bet it's not more frequent
but I mean
I bet it's still just as
surely this house alone with the different people produces quite a bit of waste
as always yeah
more than my family my mum and
because well it's because there's so many adults in one space isn't there
yeah exactly but there's only quite small
is that is that the argument
small dustbins so I can't see they come once a week
yeah
didn't look like it was that overflowing
there were like three big round black ones per house though isn't there
yeah there were
that's I think they maybe once a week still
well
but people recycle as well so you're recycling gets dis makes your rubbish smaller
that goes on a different day as well doesn't it
typically yeah
I put the rubbish out the wrong day
yeah
that wasn't good
yeah did your did you did you realise what happened?
well I just nobody else put their rubbish bins out and then the next day nobody else still did but the next night people did
oh yeah
or maybe the night after that I'm not sure
so did your mum just tell you the wrong day or did you mishear her?
oh no I don't know maybe I misheard
was it Thursday and not Tuesday or something?
yeah maybe that's what it was
that's understandable
is it time for brunch?
yeah we should cook put the George Foreman on
is that what we're cooking with?
probably good for sausages isn't it?
it will get the fat out of them it's leaner meaner fat grilling machine
then you don't have to turn the oven on
yeah
and then we just heat up the beans and fry some eggs
yeah
we've got eggs and beans haven't we
how many eggs are you having?
one
one egg?
one egg
one egg one sausage?
I'm so going to want a slice of toast with it
oh sorry my these children are
great neighbours to have
yeah I know
it's a proper nursery when we walked past it
yeah it is a genuine nursery so that will be always forever
yeah
I do think that
but not on it shouldn't be on Saturdays and Sundays
no oh I can see a woman there
unless they unless they are a very accommodating nursery
there's a couple of women in there
in which case yeah whatever though we don't need to sleep during the day we won't even be here on some days
no no
so

or just put some gentle music on or something
that's true no I'm not
a bit of music here it wouldn't have to be very loud
no
just have some chilled out music while you're studying can you study to music? it needs to be instrumental for me
yeah it needs to be fairly chilled
but I could pretty much just leave it running on instrumental and always have instrumental music running in the house
yeah it is why not?
oh that's a good crack
sorry I didn't consider the answer hook that speaker system up
that's right should have come by
bit of a beast of a George Foreman

there are no plugs here unless you want to unplug the

no probably not

that should go over this side right move everything

oh this is what I should use the rugs for in here then

you could put them in the kitchen

why is it sticky?

yeah I just

yeah
